BLIST.TITLE: Make the dough
BLIST.ITEM: Put the flour in a bowl, sifted and mixed with the baking yeast and salt. Add the sugar, the cubed butter and then the eggs.
Start kneading with your fingertips, until you get large crumbs. Spread two thirds of the dough into a springform pan, compacting it carefully.
Transfer everything to the refrigerator and let it rest for at least half an hour.

BLIST.TITLE: Make the cream
BLIST.ITEM: In a saucepan collect the corn starch and the granulated sugar. Pour the orange juice and mix carefully.
Put the saucepan on the stove and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened. Remove and let cool.
When the cream is cold, pour it into the shortcrust pastry shell and level well.
Sprinkle with the crumbs of the remaining dough and bake at 180Â°C for about 40 minutes, or in any case until the pastry is golden brown.
After the cooking time has elapsed, take the cake out of the oven and let it cool.
